Desc.eng: Ooh, a sack of warm meat with a... special necklace in his possession. Name the price!
This is just a chocolate necklace from an old hag.
What chocolate? Oh, of course! Chocolate! I get it. Will a crypt full of treasure be enough?
I still don't have any idea what you are babbling about.
To you, it's useless. For me... it's unearthly joy and salvation.
The old hag did say chocolate-coated biscuit sticks, right, Van Helsing?
Just hand it over, whatever is the price! Now!
Here is your necklace, now get out of my way.
